text:
MEB Headquarters
lit Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
September 13, 19%h
Dr. Duncan B. M. Erarich
Chief, Folklore Section
Music Division
Library of Congress
Washington, D. C.
Dear Dr. Emrich:
The members of the MEB Radio Network are interested in pos¬
sible series of radio programs in the folklore area. It was sug¬
gested that I might contact you to begin to investigate possibili¬
ties for the development of such series with you for use over our
83 member stations.
Under separate cover, we are sending you various descriptive
materials so that you may understand the sorb of organization we
are. I shall hope to hear from you in the near future if there
is a possibility of our working out some sort of cooperative proj¬
ect.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJSscp
Copied at NAEB Hqs. on October 13* l?5U-cp
